title: Jase Robertson Always Breaks Uncle Si's #1 Rule
description:
Si admits he and Jase Robertson are basically the same person ... with one glaring difference. But first, Stone tells us how he REALLY feels about dead weight in the duck blind. Martin breaks down the rules about when to call someone sir or ma'am. Stone figures out how to make duck taste like beef. Dogs and old men are highly entertaining in the duck blind this year, and one dog looks a lot like Si! Stone's scariest drill sergeants were women. And John-David reads a fan question about Jase's coolness. 
-
